verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Last night the disciple had supper with Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Their last meal together before He was betrayed

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: After prayer in the garden He was arrested,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Tortured and questioned until the next day

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: That day the mob cried out, “Crucify Him”

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: The sweet rose of Sharon was rushed on the cross

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: A rich man named Joseph took care of the body

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: While Mary and loved ones mourned their precious loss

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Last night they buried the rose in the garden

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: The fragrance of sorrow hung thick in the air

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Satan was grieving a sigh of relief

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: While angels were silently bearing their grief

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: God new that His Son would arise to great power

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: But for now He was waiting and counting the hours

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Mary and Martha spend the third morning

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Gathering spices and watched for sunrise

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: The disciples were hiding defeated and grieving

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: to distraught to remember Christ said He would rise

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: The soldiers were sleeping outside of the grave

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: Unaware that their prisoner was stirring inside

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: The stone rolled away Jesus left from the darkness

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: The dawning of grace have finally arrived

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: This morning the rose blooms in the garden

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: The fragrance of victory still fills the air

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: Last night there was weeping with no consolation

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: But this morning rejoicing in the God of salvation

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: Today there is hope in the morning light

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: What a difference God made between now and last night

verse.name: v29
verse.lines: No matter how hopeless and final the night

verse.name: v30
verse.lines: It has to give way to the Son of pure light

verse.name: v31
verse.lines: Last night,

verse.name: v32
verse.lines: Last night..

verse.name: v33
verse.lines: Last night...
